summary: Completed comprehensive testing of finance dashboard backend APIs and frontend authentication flow. Backend achieved 100% success rate with all finance features working correctly. Frontend testing limited by authentication issues but confirmed proper data-testid implementation and navigation.

ui_bugs.issue: Login attempts fail with 401 errors even with valid credentials from backend tests

integration_issues.issue: Frontend login form cannot authenticate users that were successfully created via backend API

design_issues.issue: Missing data-testid on some form elements
affected_components: signup-submit button has different testid naming (signup-submit-button vs expected signup-submit)

passed_tests: CSV ingest endpoint with multipart form data validation and warnings
Dashboard finance endpoint returns proper structure with score, KPIs, companies, data health
Finance trends endpoint returns 4 series with >=2 points each (revenue, gm_pct, opex, dso_days)
Connections status endpoint returns proper tenant objects structure
Export PDF endpoint generates valid PDF files
Onboarding flow endpoints (Xero OAuth, companies discover/select)
RBAC enforcement - VIEWER denied CSV ingest access
Frontend login page has proper data-testid attributes
Frontend signup page has proper data-testid attributes
Frontend navigation between login and signup pages works correctly
All protected routes properly redirect to login when unauthenticated
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend-backend authentication integration. Users created via backend API cannot login through frontend form (401 errors). This prevents full end-to-end testing of finance dashboard UI components. Also standardize data-testid naming convention (some use 'login-submit-button' vs 'login-submit').
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (11/11 tests passed), Frontend: 60% (authentication blocked full testing)
